oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Business - Charlie Nickens & Son
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mayor Ben West and Charlie Nickens are shown in front of the Charlie Nickens restaurant on Jefferson Street at 3rd Avenue North. A longtime Nashville landmark, the restaurant was known for barbeque and drive in service. 3 x 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Charlie Nickens & Son
Business; Restaurants
Nashville (Tenn.); Jefferson Street; Third Avenue North
